data.name: The Breadmaker
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to "The Breadmaker", a short visual novel / point and click style game that invites you to experience the simple joy of cooking.

Each day you'll be given a list of ingredients to collect that will help you create a fun new recipe! The kitchen will be fully stocked and you'll be guided every step of the way by our state-of-the-art automated instructor! That's right, while many of our aspiring cooks are still being taught by our human instructors, you'll be in our brand new program featuring automated instruction! We're still in the early stages of the program so she'll be asking you lots of questions to learn your likes and dislikes, and how best to instruct you each day.





*******************************************
Trailer Music Credits:

"Teddy Bear Waltz" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

"Crinoline Dreams" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Music was slowed, aged, and other small edits by Megon Lashley
Voices by Megon Lashley

data.short_description: Welcome to the kitchen of the future! Learning to cook has never been simpler! Enjoy five days of easy to understand recipes guided by our brand new automated instructor. As she helps you with each day's lessons you'll discover that cooking isn't really as scary as you thought.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 Display or Higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-7700HQ 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 Display or Higher

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains blood and mild gore. It contains occasional audio and visual insinuations of violence/death.
